input.command:
sleep 2 && curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/translate -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"Hello world","sourceLang":"en","targetLang":"es"}' -w "
HTTP_CODE: %{http_code}
TOTAL_TIME: %{time_total}s
" && echo "=== TEST COMPLETE ==="
